EmailTemplate.subject: Will You Be at the Indy 500 on May 28?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/CKCKTV8?marketo_zs00ja7e8g=%5bmarketo_zs00ja7e8g_value%5d&marketo_ff0s7l5qls=%5bmarketo_ff0s7l5qls_value%5d&marketo_olh86f3r9s=%5bmarketo_olh86f3r9s_value%5d&marketo_day0sfb59s=%5bmarketo_day0sfb59s_value%5d&marketo_qqebotxyuo=%5bmark> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Imagine this -- in just 20 days you and a friend could be sitting at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway watching the 101st Running of the Indy 500! <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/CKCKTV8?marketo_zs00ja7e8g=%5bmarketo_zs00ja7e8g_value%5d&marketo_ff0s7l5qls=%5bmarketo_ff0s7l5qls_value%5d&marketo_olh86f3r9s=%5bmarketo_olh86f3r9s_value%5d&marketo_day0sfb59s=%5bmarketo_day0sfb59s_value%5d&marketo_qqebotxyuo=%5bmark&mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiWXpGbFpXWXdOVEUyTVdOaSIsInQiOiJqMmFoYTdkS2NxMk45czRjYityYllXeGNxT1U2MXNFSTd2MVhcL2lLeHlMdzNFSFU5Qm93eEY1UGF6OWtXamRnTUQ1SERXXC9vTkNyTEZEelo2T1RWUE1RPT0ifQ%3D%3D]]> Turbonomic is giving away two Reserved Seating tickets for the event, for simply scheduling a 30-minute meeting with a Turbonomic engineer. Itâ€™s that easy! The giveaway ends on May 15th, and the tickets are going fast. Make sure you schedule your meeting today <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/CKCKTV8?marketo_zs00ja7e8g=%5bmarketo_zs00ja7e8g_value%5d&marketo_ff0s7l5qls=%5bmarketo_ff0s7l5qls_value%5d&marketo_olh86f3r9s=%5bmarketo_olh86f3r9s_value%5d&marketo_day0sfb59s=%5bmarketo_day0sfb59s_value%5d&marketo_qqebotxyuo=%5bmark]]>! - The Turbonomic Team
